page.title: 13At Home Part 1
page.content: In our area there are{257}people{193} being adults and{63}children. Of the{94}houses in our block most are privately owned, many being individually designed. The people enjoy a fairly high standard of living as we discovered during a survey of houses in our area.{72%}have double glazing and{59%}have central heating. {89%}have washing machines,{64%}tumble dryers but only{35%}have dishwashers. Everyone has a fridge while{77%}have freezers.{24%}have a microwave oven. Everyone has television some people having as many as three sets.{92%}have colour televisions,{50%}a video recorder,{88%}a music centre and everyone has more than one radio.{36%} have a home computer and all houses have a telephone.{21%}have a piano and {43%}have other musical instruments.
